name: Jam the Factory
description:
after you have been betrayed by the factory you have worked for more than 30 years at, you have decided to take revenge, you find anything you have in you house, be it a jar of jam, your trusty tools, a radio jammer, or even a boombox,  and get your revenge

asd to move

space to dodge

left click to attack 

1,2,3 for weapons 

F5 to restart
